import React, {useState} from 'react' import './ExpenseForm.css' const ExpenseForm = () => { const [enteredTitle, setEnteredTitle] = useState(''); const [enteredAmount, setEnteredAmount] = useState('') const [enteredDate, setEnteredDate] = useState('') const titleChangeHandler = (event) => { setEnteredTitle(event.target.value) }; const amountChangeHandler = (event) => {}; const dateChangeHandler = (event) => {}; return
} export default ExpenseForm
